title: Create Personalized Product Recommendations
description: A customer is browsing a product page. The system should display personalized recommendations for related products.

tasks.description: Identify the product the customer is currently viewing.
tasks.expected_outcome: System identifies the current product SKU.

tasks.description: Analyze the customer's browsing history and past purchases.
tasks.expected_outcome: System retrieves the customer's activity data.

tasks.description: Generate a list of recommended products based on collaborative filtering ('customers who bought this also bought...').
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a relevant list of 3-5 product recommendations.
